options.freecam.settings.title: FreeCam Settings
options.freecam.settings.slowdown.toolti:
Controls how quickly camera lose its speed when you release all buttons.
Current value: speed is multiplied by %s every second
options.freecam.settings.target.tooltip: Allows you to target blocks/entities by using FreeCam position
options.freecam.settings.hands.tooltip: Show/hide player hands while in FreeCam
Remembers state of WASD/Jump/Crouch keys when you activate FreeCam
options.freecam.settings.show.name: Show My Name
options.freecam.settings.show.name.toolt: Show/hide your name while in FreeCam
